input_text:
Job Title: Licensed Esthetician - Casual 

Location: Maui County, HI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Organization- Hana Hotel Maui

Summary

At Hyatt, we believe our guests select Hyatt because of our caring and attentive associates who are focused on providing authentic hospitality and meaningful experiences to each and every guest. Hyatt is a place where high expectations aren't just met-they're exceeded. It's a place of outstanding rewards, where talent opens doors to exciting challenges in the hospitality industry.

The Licensed Esthetician functions as an integral member of the Spa team by providing guest services and thorough and professional skin care therapy. T

The hourly rate for this position is $14.00 plus commission is earned on treatments.

Essential Duties:

 Provide product, gift and treatment recommendations to guests which promote health and wellness  Performs inventories, as needed  Assists in setting up displays  Washes and folds towels, cleans facilities and equipment, maintains refreshments, etc. 

Other Duties:

 Maintains high sanitary standards, including performing safety inspections of spa facilities and addressing any deficiencies.  Assures that required equipment and supplies are ready and in good working order.  Is familiar with all hotel services/features and local attractions/activities to respond to guest inquires accurately.  Performs all tasks and provides services in conformance with policies, procedures, work instructions, training, codes of conduct, recognized best practices, safety laws and regulations.  Interacts with other departments or contractors to assure seamless delivery of the program for the benefit of our guests.  Serves as a subject matter expert on specific programs.  Adheres to the “leave no trace” principles when performing tasks.  Other duties as requested. 

 Hyatt is an Equal Opportunity Employer – M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity 

Qualifications 

 Education: Professional education relevant to work as an esthetician and sufficient for the State of Hawaii licensing requirements  Experience: At least two years of post-license experience  Possession of a valid Hawaii license as an esthetician, as needed  Able to deal effectively and interact well with guests and co-workers.  Available for work which may include weekends and evening scheduling  Excellent communication skills  Able to perform simple arithmetic involved in selling products and making change  Demonstrated knowledge, understanding, and application of wellness concepts  Knowledge in the safe and appropriate use of tools, equipment, props and procedures related to the essential functions of the job  Ability and skill in using basic computer systems and software  Physical Requirements: Able to lift 25 pounds  Able to remain standing for long periods of time  Able to maneuver and control equipment  Able to work with and around chemicals present in swimming pools and spas  Able to perform all essential duties with or without accommodation

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Licensed Esthetician - Casual
output_json.summary: An integral member of the Spa team providing guest services and professional skin care therapy.
job_responsibilities: Ensures equipment and supplies are ready
Familiar with hotel services/features and local attractions
Conforms to policies, procedures, work instructions, training, codes of conduct, best practices, safety laws and regulations
Interacts with other departments or contractors
Serves as a subject matter expert
output_json.physical_requirements: Able to lift 25 pounds, stand for long periods, maneuver and control equipment, work with chemicals in swimming pools and spas
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Hyatt is an Equal Opportunity Employer – M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity

other.content:
Education: Professional education relevant to work as an esthetician and sufficient for the State of Hawaii licensing requirements
Experience: At least two years of post-license experience
Possession of a valid Hawaii license as an esthetician, as needed
Able to deal effectively and interact well with guests and co-workers
Available for work which may include weekends and evening scheduling
Excellent communication skills
Able to perform simple arithmetic involved in selling products and making change
Demonstrated knowledge, understanding, and application of wellness concepts
Knowledge in the safe and appropriate use of tools, equipment, props and procedures related to the essential functions of the job
Ability and skill in using basic computer systems and software
Physical Requirements: Able to lift 25 pounds, able to remain standing for long periods of time, able to maneuver and control equipment, able to work with and around chemicals present in swimming pools and spas
